title: Promotional website for YouTube channel @rashmijoshi6703 with clear clickable hyperlinks

requirements.text: Create a responsive, single-page promotional website for the YouTube channel handle @rashmijoshi6703, with clear calls-to-action and prominent clickable hyperlinks to the channel.

quotes: @rashmijoshi6703 this is my you tube channel.. Please create beautiful website ..so it will also help my channel grow faster.. Make it highly skilled and workable click able hyperlink.

acceptanceCriteria: Landing page renders without errors and is responsive across mobile/tablet/desktop.
The page includes a prominent primary CTA button linking to https://www.youtube.com/@rashmijoshi6703.
All external links are clearly styled as interactive, keyboard-focusable, and open in a new tab with safe rel attributes (noopener/noreferrer).

requirements.text: Add content sections suitable for a YouTube channel promo site: Hero (channel name/handle + subscribe CTA), About, Featured content (a grid of video/playlist link cards), and Contact/Links section (additional hyperlinks the owner can add).

quotes: Please create beautiful website ..so it will also help my channel grow faster..

acceptanceCriteria: Sections are present and navigable via in-page anchor links (e.g., #about, #featured, #links).
Featured content is represented as a list of cards that link out (URLs stored in a simple editable data structure in the frontend).
All links are clickable, visually consistent, and have hover/focus states.

requirements.text: Implement a coherent, creative visual theme and apply it consistently across typography, spacing, components, and backgrounds (avoid default/plain styling).
acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across all sections (colors, type scale, button styles, card styles).
Page looks polished: aligned layout grid, consistent spacing, and clear hierarchy.

requirements.text: Add basic on-page SEO and shareability enhancements: meaningful page title, meta description, and an attractive hero headline/subheadline (English).

quotes: so it will also help my channel grow faster

acceptanceCriteria: Document title includes the channel handle/name and indicates it is an official channel site.
Meta description is present and written in English.
Hero heading/subheading are present in English and clearly describe the channel.

requirements.text: Add a site header with navigation links (in-page anchors) and a sticky or easily accessible “Subscribe” CTA that links to https://www.youtube.com/@rashmijoshi6703.

quotes: Make it highly skilled and workable click able hyperlink.

acceptanceCriteria: Header navigation links scroll to the correct sections.
Subscribe CTA is present and usable on both desktop and mobile.
All navigation and CTAs are accessible via keyboard (tab/enter/space).

requirements.text: Add generated static image assets (hero/banner and a channel avatar placeholder) and render them in the UI from frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images from the backend).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images exist under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced by the UI.
Hero/banner image is visible in the hero section without layout shift.
Images include appropriate alt text in English.

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
Do not modify any frontend paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not add third-party auth providers; only Internet Identity is allowed (and only if needed—no auth required for this landing site).
Keep backend as single-actor Motoko; do not introduce additional backend services.
nonGoals: Integrating with the YouTube Data API to auto-fetch latest videos/playlists.
Building a full CMS/admin panel for managing content.
Real-time chat, push notifications, or email service integrations.

required: Wide hero banner background with abstract creator-themed shapes, warm sunset palette (hero-banner.dim_1920x800.png)
Clean circular avatar placeholder illustration, warm neutral palette (channel-avatar.dim_512x512.png)
Small set of minimal social/link icons in a consistent outline style (social-icons-set.dim_256x256.png)
